mapper.insert:
SELECT siebel.S_SEQUENCE_S.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SIEBEL.CX_TIME_LOG ( row_id, DB_LAST_UPD_SRC, LAST_UPD_BY, CREATED_BY, ATT05, METHOD, DESCS, TYPE, INV_USER, SPEND_TIME, ATT02, ATT01, NAME, ATT03) VALUES (#{rowId},'USER', '0-1', '0-1',#{ATT05}, #{METHOD}, #{DESCS}, 'J2EE', #{INV_USER},#{SPEND_TIME}, #{ATT02}, #{ATT01},#{NAME},#{ATT03})
mapper.update: update SIEBEL.CX_TIME_LOG set ATT05=#{ATT05}, ATT01=#{ATT01}, ATT02=#{ATT02}, ATT03=#{ATT03}, METHOD=#{METHOD}, INV_USER= #{INV_USER}, NAME=#{NAME}, SPEND_TIME=#{SPEND_TIME} where ROW_ID = #{ROW_ID}
